meanings.definition: relating to or involving sexual intercourse
meanings.sent1: The couple engaged in a coitional activity last night.
meanings.sent2: The doctor discussed the importance of coitional health with the patients.
meanings.sent3: The coitional dance at the party was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The coitional bond between the characters in the movie was evident.
meanings.sent5: The coitional nature of the relationship was undeniable.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the act of copulation
meanings.sent1: The animals displayed coitional behavior in the wild.
meanings.sent2: The researcher studied the coitional patterns of the species.
meanings.sent3: The coitional ritual of the birds was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: The coitional instinct in nature is strong for survival.
